SELECT E.ID AS id,E.ENTRUST_ID AS entrustId, E.FLOW_ID AS flowId, (SELECT U.USER_NAME FROM USER_INFO U WHERE U.ORG_ID=E.ORG_ID AND U.ACCOUNT_ID=E.TO_ID) AS toUserName, B.FLOW_NAME AS flowName,E.STATUS AS status, E.CREATE_TIME AS createTime,E.TO_ID AS toId,E.BEGIN_TIME AS beginTime,E.END_TIME AS endTime, (SELECT U.USER_NAME FROM USER_INFO U WHERE U.ORG_ID=E.ORG_ID AND U.ACCOUNT_ID=E.CREATE_USER) AS createUserName FROM BPM_ENTRUST E LEFT JOIN BPM_FLOW B ON E.ORG_ID=B.ORG_ID AND E.FLOW_ID=B.FLOW_ID WHERE E.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND E.FROM_ID=#{accountId}
